series.title: Bachelors at Large
series.description: A Harlequin Intrigue Miniseries

series.title: Code Red
series.description:
Courage Bay, California...a community founded on bravery.
Ordinary people, extraordinary circumstances

Code Red was a twelve-book continuity series published by Harlequin in 2004 and 2005. It was preceded by a standalone anthology and three prequels (.2-.8) published in the Harlequin Superromance line, and followed by four spinoffs (13-16).
